Title: bit_count
Description: Returns the number of bits set in the bit string (also known as “popcount”).

Title: bit_length
Description: Returns number of bits in the bit string.

Title: length
Description: Returns number of bits in the bit string.

Title: octet_length
Description: Returns number of bytes in the bit string.

Title: overlay
Feature: overlay ( bits bit PLACING newsubstring bit FROM start integer [ FOR count integer ] ) → bit
Description: Replaces the substring of bits that starts at the start'th bit and extends for count bits with newsubstring. If count is omitted, it defaults to the length of newsubstring.

Title: position
Feature: position ( substring bit IN bits bit ) → integer
Description: Returns first starting index of the specified substring within bits, or zero if it's not present.

Title: substring
Feature: substring ( bits bit [ FROM start integer ] [ FOR count integer ] ) → bit
Description: Extracts the substring of bits starting at the start'th bit if that is specified, and stopping after count bits if that is specified. Provide at least one of start and count.

Title: get_bit
Feature: get_bit ( bits bit, n integer ) → integer
Description: Extracts n'th bit from bit string; the first (leftmost) bit is bit 0.

Title: set_bit
Feature: set_bit ( bits bit, n integer, newvalue integer ) → bit
Description: Sets n'th bit in bit string to newvalue; the first (leftmost) bit is bit 0.
